summary: TypeScript SDK needs to implement execution-chain following behavior that was fixed in the Go SDK (PR #527). This ensures proper handling of workflow execution chains in later server versions.
userImpact: Workflows may not execute correctly with later server versions due to missing execution-chain following behavior.
rootCause: TypeScript SDK lacks execution-chain following implementation that Go SDK implemented in PR #527.
proposedFix: Implement the same execution-chain following behavior as the Go SDK fix (reference: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/pull/527)
resolutionDetails: Implementation aligned with Go SDK's execution-chain following behavior for later server version compatibility.
keyQuote: See details from the Go fix here: https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-go/pull/527
